scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production yarn fetch-contract && NODE_ENV=production nodemon app.js --ignore zt_report
scripts.start-staging: NODE_ENV=staging yarn fetch-contract  && NODE_ENV=staging nodemon app.js --ignore zt_report
scripts.run-production: NODE_ENV=production yarn fetch-contract && rm -f ./log-production.log && pm2 kill && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start app.js --node-args='--max-old-space-size=4096' -l ./log-production.log
scripts.run-staging: NODE_ENV=staging yarn fetch-contract && rm -f ./log-staging.log && pm2 kill && NODE_ENV=staging pm2 start app.js --node-args='--max-old-space-size=4096' -l ./log-staging.log
scripts.run-private: rm -f ./log-private.log && pm2 kill && NODE_ENV=private pm2 start app.js --node-args='--max-old-space-size=4096' -l ./log-private.log
scripts.pkg-cmd: yarn fix-scrapedin && pkg -c package.json bin/zt-holon --output debinstall/zerotheft-holon/usr/local/bin/zt-holon --targets linux
scripts.pkg: NODE_ENV=production yarn fetch-contract && NODE_ENV=staging yarn fetch-contract && yarn remove-dir && yarn copy-dir && yarn pkg-cmd && pkg app.js -c package.json --output debinstall/zerotheft-holon/usr/local/bin/zerotheft-holon --targets linux && dpkg-deb --build debinstall/zerotheft-holon
scripts.init-utils: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ./sub-modules/zerotheft-node-utils && yarn install
